author: cmpilato
msg: Add a new --stdout command-line option to commit-email.pl which
overrides the configured mail delivery methods and causes the script
to generate mbox-formatted mailstuffs to stdout.  This is a followup
Patch by: Lars Müller <lm{_AT_}openslx.com>
(Tweaked by me.)
* tools/hook-scripts/commit-email.pl.in
(): Add processing for a new --stdout command-line option.
(opt_to_hash_key): Add --stdout item.
(usage): Note new option.
(new_project): Populate 'stdout' member.

author: malcolm
msg: * CHANGES (1.4.3): Add new section for 1.4.3, including all changes to date.

author: dlr
msg: r22283, r22284, r22285, and r22286 from trunk into the 1.4.x branch,
fixing the previously busticated API usage in svn-graph.pl, and
improving its algorithms and output.
Votes: +1: dlr, +0: danderson

author: dlr
msg: * STATUS
Add danderson's vote for the svn-graph.pl changes, and note merge
test 30 regression which lgo wants fixed before we cut 1.4.3.

author: dlr
msg: A follow-up to r22964, fixing the JavaHL bindings to both compile and
support peg revisions for its 'copy' API.
This needs some additional work to fully support the new
svn_client_copy_item_t structure introduced for per-copy source peg
revisions.
* subversion/bindings/java/javahl/native/SVNClient.cpp
(SVNClient::copy): Convert "srcs" to an array of
svn_client_copy_item_t's in a manner which supports the pegRevision
parameter, fixing the build breakage introduced in r22964.
